I hope National Public Lands Day reminds my Senate colleagues that we still need to secure permanent funding for the Land and Water Conservation Fund, which is critical for preserving America’s parks and outdoor recreation sites for future generations. #LWCF

Tomorrow is National Public Lands Day. I hope everyone uses this day to experience the wonder of America's best idea. To celebrate, volunteer in your community or visit one of America's beautiful national parks for free.

On Sunday, the Falivenas completed their journey in Atlanta with the @Braves. Larry’s determination to make a difference in the face of his diagnoses is an inspiration. It’s people like him – who refuse to give up the fight - who continue pushing us towards a cure for #ALS pic.twitter.com/8i3spxKoD2

When Larry Falivena ( @lfchallengeals ) from Apex, NC was diagnosed with ALS, he and his family decided they were going to challenge the disease by embarking on the "Iron Horse Tour."

The goal: visit all 30 @MLB ballparks in the country and raise awareness for ALS.
